availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Aaron Cline (Hickman County, Kentucky, (Moscow) grocer and tavern keeper)

body.p: Moscow, Kentucky, grocer and tavern keeper. Kentucky native. Father of Sarah June Cline, William Cline, James Cline, Mary Cline, Albert Cline, Susan F. Cline, George Cline, Married to Mary Tichel Cline in Fulton County, Kentucky, in May 1849. Father of Joel B. Cline, Martha Cline, Victoria Cline, and Ellen M. Cline. Farmer with William Cline in Obion County, Tennessee, in 1850. Grocer in Moscow, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Obion County, District 2, pp. 352B-353A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Moscow, p. 442.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Fulton County Marriages, Film #000321403, p. 97, p. 184 of microfilm.
KYR-0001-004-0394.
